description:
A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once


Since 10.0.3 and 10.0.4 did not go to plan and were unpublished... this is a release to (hopefully) sort out the glaring issues of those versions as well as finally make their fixes available again!
Changed
- fix: replace gnome icons with oxygen ones in the multimc icon theme by @DioEgizio in #5012
Fixed
- Fix symlink instance copying on Windows by @Ryex in #4947
- feat: Auto handle Http 429 Too Many Requests with retry by @Ryex in #4946
- fix(ModrinthCheckUpdate): always increment loader index by @Octol1ttle in #4923
- fix(macos): fix margins on macos by @DioEgizio in #4977
- fix: remove unused qt plugins on linux appimage and portable by @DioEgizio in #5026
10.0.3/10.0.4 changelog
Added
- MSAStep: Log server errors by @Octol1ttle in #4895
- add more loaders to override setting by @Trial97 in #4701
Changed
- Abort launch when there are libraries missing by @Octol1ttle in #4899
- Mention nightly Flatpak in docs by @getchoo in #4887
- Take $GRADLE_USER_HOME into account when looking for JDKs by @SandaruKasa in #4790
- [AppImage] use portals for file picking by @DioEgizio in #4759
- auth: improve status messages by @Octol1ttle in #4750
- improve we couldn't launch after 3 tries message by @DioEgizio in #4805
- update to qt 6.10.2, build codeql on the qt version we still want to support, sign DLLs on windows by @DioEgizio in #4909
Fixed
- Add missing returns after task signal activation by @Octol1ttle in #4836
- Fix auto-join getting stuck disabled by @TheKodeToad in #4711
- Fix for Prism failing to recognize some shader pack ZIP archives added manually by the user by @SwitchAxe in #4745
- Fix instance and settings window minimum size by @TheKodeToad in #4769
- Fix some modpacks not importing by @Trial97 in #4761
- Fix world size being wrong by @Trial97 in #4784
- Free up disk space on Flatpak builds so they don't crash by @Octol1ttle in #4755
- IconList: Make sure we always set new path by @Octol1ttle in #4753
- MSAStep: Tighten isSchemeHandlerRegistered check by @Octol1ttle in #4841
- MinecraftSettingsWidget: Swap window width/height spinboxes by @Octol1ttle in #4853
- ModrinthCheckUpdate: Don't send a request that is doomed to fail by @Octol1ttle in #4840
- PackProfile: don't reset dirty if component list saving failed by @Octol1ttle in #4870
- Set current auth step description in correct method by @Octol1ttle in #4733
- Trim whitespace from path values in settings by @getchoo in #4886
- [Windows] Fix JPEG and WEBP in MinGW builds by @DioEgizio in #4739
- fix ftb import for old packs by @Trial97 in #4787
Removed
- Remove in-tree flatpak by @getchoo in #4856
